title: ‘Titanic’ Director James Cameron Points to Flaws in Titan Sub’s Design
description: The “Titanic” director and diving expert said he’d had concerns from the start about the vehicle’s hull composition and claims about its network of hull sensors.

title: SmileDirectClub to Release Customers From NDAs in Settlement
description: The telehealth company is stopping its practice of asking some customers to sign nondisclosure agreements as part of their refunds.

title: Microsoft Says it Could Abandon Activision Deal if Judge Delays It
description: A five-day hearing over Microsoft’s $70 billion acquisition, which the Federal Trade Commission hopes to block, began Thursday in federal court.

title: Elon Musk Proposes ‘Cage Match’ With Mark Zuckerberg
description: The technology moguls who run Twitter and Meta appeared to agree to a fight, the latest twist in a long-running feud.
